00002         class DocComment {
00003                 private static $classes = array();
00004                 private static $methods = array();
00005                 private static $fields = array();
00006                 private static $parsedFiles = array();
00007         
00008                 public static function clearCache() {
00009                         self::$classes = array();
00010                         self::$methods = array();
00011                         self::$fields = array();
00012                         self::$parsedFiles = array();
00013                 }
00014                 
00015                 public function get($reflection) {
00016                         if($reflection instanceof ReflectionClass) {
00017                                 return $this->forClass($reflection);
00018                         } elseif($reflection instanceof ReflectionMethod) {
00019                                 return $this->forMethod($reflection);
00020                         } elseif($reflection instanceof ReflectionProperty) {
00021                                 return $this->forProperty($reflection);
00022                         }
00023                 }
00024         
00025                 public function forClass($reflection) {
00026                         $this->process($reflection->getFileName());
00027                         $name = $reflection->getName();
00028                         return isset(self::$classes[$name]) ? self::$classes[$name] : false;
00029                 }
00030                 
00031                 public function forMethod($reflection) {
00032                         $this->process($reflection->getDeclaringClass()->getFileName());
00033                         $class = $reflection->getDeclaringClass()->getName();
00034                         $method = $reflection->getName();
00035                         return isset(self::$methods[$class][$method]) ? self::$methods[$class][$method] : false;
00036                 }
00037         
00038                 public function forProperty($reflection) {
00039                         $this->process($reflection->getDeclaringClass()->getFileName());
00040                         $class = $reflection->getDeclaringClass()->getName();
00041                         $field = $reflection->getName();
00042                         return isset(self::$fields[$class][$field]) ? self::$fields[$class][$field] : false;
00043                 }
00044                 
00045                 private function process($file) {
00046                         if(!isset(self::$parsedFiles[$file])) {
00047                                 $this->parse($file);
00048                                 self::$parsedFiles[$file] = true;
00049                         }
00050                 }
00051                 
00052                 protected function parse($file) {
00053                         $tokens = $this->getTokens($file);
00054                         $currentClass = false;
00055                         $currentBlock = false;
00056                         $max = count($tokens);
00057                         $i = 0;
00058                         while($i < $max) {
00059                                 $token = $tokens[$i];
00060                                 if(is_array($token)) {
00061                                         list($code, $value) = $token;
00062                                         switch($code) {
00063                                                 case T_DOC_COMMENT: 
00064                                                         $comment = $value; 
00065                                                         break;
00066                                                 
00067                                                 case T_CLASS: 
00068                                                         $class = $this->getString($tokens, $i, $max);
00069                                                         if($comment !== false) {
00070                                                                 self::$classes[$class] = $comment;
00071                                                                 $comment = false;
00072                                                         }
00073                                                         break;
00074                                                         
00075                                                 case T_VARIABLE: 
00076                                                         if($comment !== false) {
00077                                                                 $field = substr($token[1], 1);
00078                                                                 self::$fields[$class][$field] = $comment;
00079                                                                 $comment = false;
00080                                                         }
00081                                                         break;
00082                                                 
00083                                                 case T_FUNCTION:
00084                                                         if($comment !== false) {
00085                                                                 $function = $this->getString($tokens, $i, $max);
00086                                                                 self::$methods[$class][$function] = $comment;
00087                                                                 $comment = false;
00088                                                         }
00089                                                         
00090                                                         break;
00091                                                 
00092                                                 // ignore
00093                                                 case T_WHITESPACE: 
00094                                                 case T_PUBLIC: 
00095                                                 case T_PROTECTED: 
00096                                                 case T_PRIVATE: 
00097                                                 case T_ABSTRACT: 
00098                                                 case T_FINAL: 
00099                                                 case T_VAR: 
00100                                                         break;
00101                                                 
00102                                                 default: 
00103                                                         $comment = false;
00104                                                         break;
00105                                         }
00106                                 } else {
00107                                         $comment = false;
00108                                 }
00109                                 $i++;
00110                         }
00111                 }
00112                 
00113                 private function getString($tokens, &$i, $max) {
00114                         do {
00115                                 $token = $tokens[$i];
00116                                 $i++;
00117                                 if(is_array($token)) {
00118                                         if($token[0] == T_STRING) {
00119                                                 return $token[1];
00120                                         }
00121                                 }
00122                         } while($i <= $max);
00123                         return false;
00124                 }
00125                 
00126                 private function getTokens($file) {
00127                         return token_get_all(file_get_contents($file));
00128                 }
00129         }
